Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are travelling along Nagaritha Drive, which runs east to west.
Room.LongDescription: Nagaritha Drive provides town access to the larger estates in the richest portions of town, to the east. On the north side of the road is Natasha's Arabian Horses, and a small stable. It looks like you can buy and have horses trained here. On the south side of the road, a small shop called Varga's Gold and Fine Jewelry does business. The entrance to the shop is located on Main Street.
